experience: You and Deborah both know Bret Giles, Mark Shander, and 41 others
Ashley Ellis, Inc - a GEE Group Company

My day to day responsibilities are to find jobs for people and people for jobs. I started as a Personnel Consultant with GEE, and ran a Branch at one time. I have supervised up to a 12-desk office, while maintaining my sales and recruiting activities. I have been responsible for hiring, performance evaluations, training and motivation of the employees in the Phoenix branch. We specialize in placing IT, Engineering / Technical and Accounting professionals in Direct Hire, Contract-to-Hire and Contract positions.
Ashley Ellis, Inc - A GEE Group Company
This was my title up until September of 2006. I worked in our Phoenix location and was promoted to Branch Supervisor of our Scottsdale location.
Account Management to clients that wanted to rent names for mailing lists.This includes order entry, JCL programming and heavy customer support by phone.

Alpha Kappa Psi Co-Ed Business Fraternity: Big Brother two times, VP of my Chapter, VP of my pledge class. Played on fraternity volleyball league. Arranged for professional speakers and fund raisers. Worked at the Superbowl at the Rose Bowl.

Every spring, I join Western Refining at The Arizona Special Olympics Summer Games. I help out in the Olympic Village, assisting athletes and their families and friends with crafts and activities. We have arts and crafts, karaoke and a dance floor with a DJ, a photo booth, carnival and video games, snow cones, popcorn - anything and everything to entertain when the athletes are not participating in an event. It is a ton of fun and I plan on doing it as long as I possibly can!

Jim Lindsey
Independent Consultant
October 15, 2009, Jim worked with Deborah but at different companies

While working as a Senior Manager of Web Development at The Arizona Republic / azcentral.com, I utilized Deborah Cross and the folks at General Employment on multiple occasions to fill several of my open web development positions.  Deborah did a great job of listening to my needs, understanding my requirements, and identifying possible candidates.  Several of those candidates turned into outstanding new-hires for me - I never would have had the opportunity to bring these quality individuals on staff had it not been for Deborah and General Employment.In working with Deborah over the past 3 to 4 years, I always found her to be very professional and someone I could count on to fill an open IT position with the same sense of urgency that I shared.  Her follow-through was terrific, and she always did a great job of working through my many scheduling issues.  As a hiring manager, I felt that she not only had her client's best interest in mind, but my best interests as well.... something you rarely find these days.

summary: 15+ Years of recruiting and client development for a nationwide staffing firm that specializes in Information Technology and Engineering / Technical staffing. I offer full-service staffing - direct hire, contract and contract-to-hire. I work with the candidates and the clients to make the match - basically, I find "jobs for people and people for jobs". In 2006, I was promoted to Branch Supervisor of our Scottsdale location after spending 10 years in our Phoenix branch. I am responsible for hiring and developing Personnel Consultants and striving to make my branch #1 in the country.Specialties: Engineering / Technical & Information Technology - IT Managers, PHP & .net Web Developers, DBA, Software Engineers, Network Specialists, Telecommunications, RCDD, NEPA Environmental Planners, Marketing Professionals, Construction, Civil Engineering, Landscape Architecture, Survey, Architecture, Environmental Engineering, Manufacturing Engineers, Electronics Engineers, Mechanical Engineers, Electrical Engineers, W/WW (Water / Wastewater) Engineers, Bridge Design & Inspection, Commissioning.
